# About

> Have **more** than you show, speak *less* than you know. -- *William Shakespeare*

## Quarto

A **technical writing** system that produces *reproducible*, *versioned*, and *extensible* documents.

![](quarto-dark-bg.jpeg)

## Markdown

Quarto uses [**Pandoc-flavoured Markdown**](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/markdown-basics.html) for text formatting.

This is **bold** and this _is_ *italic*. And this is `code`. What about a [link](https://quarto.org)? And a footnote[^1]? Perhaps a crossed out text ~~like this~~? We can also use subscript~s~ and superscript^s^.

- A list...
- ...for the *unordered*.


[^1]: This is a footnote.

## Reveal.js

A **presentation** framework that uses HTML and CSS to create slides. No need for PowerPoint or Keynote.
